burtis.modules.passengers.model

Class PassengerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.passengers.model.PassengerManager

  • public class PassengerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Passenger manager for Passenger Module.
    Author:
    Mikołaj Sowiński

    • Field Summary

      private int generationCycleLength
      Number of iterations between passengers generations.

      Number of iterations to the next generation.

      List of living passengers.

      Number of passengers to be generated on each generation.

    • Field Detail

      • passengers

        private final java.util.List<Passenger> passengers
        List of living passengers.

      • generationCycleLength

        private int generationCycleLength
        Number of iterations between passengers generations.

      • passengersPerCycle

        private int passengersPerCycle
        Number of passengers to be generated on each generation.

      • leftToGeneration

        private int leftToGeneration
        Number of iterations to the next generation. Zero means moment of generation.

        private Managers managers

    • Method Detail

      • setGenerationCycleLength

        public void setGenerationCycleLength(int generationCycleLength)

      • setPassengersPerCycle

        public void setPassengersPerCycle(int passengersPerCycle)

      • setManagers

        public void setManagers(Managers managers)

      • killPassenger

        public void killPassenger(Passenger passenger)
        Removes passenger from the list. BEWARE: Does not remove neither from buses nor from bus stops!
        Parameters:
        passenger - passenger to be killed.

      • generatePassengers

        public void generatePassengers()
        Generates number of passengers (passengersPerCycle) at given interval (generationCycleLength). Passengers are given random origin bus stops and random destinations taking into account that destination should be further than origin.

      • updateWaitingTime

        public void updateWaitingTime()
        Updates waiting time of passengers.

      • addPassenger

        public void addPassenger(BusStop origin,
                         BusStop destination)
        Adds passenger with given destination to the given bus stop.
        Parameters:
        origin - - origin stop of the passenger.
        destination - - destination stop of the passenger.
